name: Smile for Bigfoot
description:
Welcome to the Bigfoot experience.

Take the role of Bigfoot, a.k.a. "Project B", a genetically modified Bigfoot used by the S.E.C.T.O.R.S. for their stuff.

Sup gnomey.

And here. we. go, let the war begin. Bigfoot's brain chips activate once again, the target is Mc Dougal, a guy planning to destroy the S.E.C.T.O.R.S. with a modified water gun. I don't know if Bigfoot even stands a chance, well, he probably does considering he's Bigfoot, the Sasucatch.

We trust you little thing, you are in control now.

Credits:

Graphics by me, soundtrack mainly by me, RPG Maker by Enterbrain, the credits of stuff made by other people are in a txt file inside the game's folder.

Download the soundtrack!

Hope you enjoy the game.
